name: ExportReportToCSV
description: The mashup allows to export data from the created custom grapfical reports and get the information represented in a tabular form.
author: Aliaksei Shytkin <shitkin@targetprocess.com>

scripts.build-production: target=build && webpack --config webpack-production.config.js --output-path $target && cd $target && mv index.js release.js
scripts.build-library: target=build/library; rm -rf $target && webpack --config webpack-library.config.js --output-path $target && cp doc/README.md $target/README.mkd && cp doc/*.png $target
